message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"serious; earnest; doing something carefully and with a lot of attention.","sentence":"他很认真。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing a young man sitting at a simple table, concentrating deeply while writing in a notebook. His face shows focus and seriousness. The setting around him is minimalistic, with slight signs of gentle decay or change, yet a warm light highlights his concentrated expression. No complex background, just an atmosphere that suggests focus and care.","sentence_translation":"He is very serious."}
